– Lots of little foods that can add up to big hela. They’ve got tiny burgers in big buns and warm banana bread. Get a glass of passion juice!

– It has Tanzanian fare plus some baked goods. You can sit in a booth, watch television.

– 5000/= self-contained single (but the beds are double-bed  size), big room with a television, the running water isn’t hot but the matron will bring you some if you ask, less than five-minutes’ walk from the bus standi.
